row.name: UC4RB_TC_FAIL_IF_RUNNING#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_TC_FAIL_IF_RUNNINGs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Fail if running" tooltip="Boolean value specifying whether the job should fail in case the server is already running." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Fail if running</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_TC_FAIL_IF_RUNNINGs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Boolean value specifying whether the job should fail in case the server is already running.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup>

row.name: UC4RB_TC_JAVA_OPTIONS#
row.xui: <text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_TC_JAVA_OPTIONSs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Java Runtime options" tooltip="Only used, if script-mode is chosen and not empty. Include any additional Java runtime options to use when starting up Tomcat. E.g. -DXmx800m for heap size etc. (Uses JAVA_OPTS parameter of the startup script)" upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Java Runtime options</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_TC_JAVA_OPTIONSs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Only used, if script-mode is chosen and not empty. Include any additional Java runtime options to use when starting up Tomcat. E.g. -DXmx800m for heap size etc. (Uses JAVA_OPTS parameter of the startup script)</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text>

row.name: UC4RB_TC_SERVICE_NAME#

row.name: UC4RB_TC_START_MODE#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_TC_START_MODEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Start mode" tooltip="If 'script' the action starts Tomcat using the startup.bat/startup.sh script of Tomcat found in UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/bin/ If 'service', it is assumed, that the Windows service/Unix deamon is preconfigured and the action starts the service/deamon." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.AUTOMIC_TOMCAT.PRV.VARA.SCRIPT_SERVICE</entry><entry name="text">Start mode</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_TC_START_MODEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">If 'script' the action starts Tomcat using the startup.bat/startup.sh script of Tomcat found in UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/bin/ If 'service', it is assumed, that the Windows service/Unix deamon is preconfigured and the action starts the service/deamon.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup>
